author: Silvia Amaro
title: IMF slashes growth forecasts, says world will 'very likely' experience worst recession since the 1930s
description: The global economy will this year likely suffer the worst financial crisis since the Great Depression, the International Monetary Fund said.
content:
An exterior view of the building of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), with the IMG logo, is seen on March 27, 2020 in Washington, DC.
